Description.Text:
Property Location
Hôtel Havane is in the heart of Paris, walking distance from Folies Bergere and Paris Museum of Freemasonry. This hotel is close to Louvre Museum and Notre Dame Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 48 guestrooms. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and a 24-hour front desk.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.


Make yourself at home in one of the 48 guestrooms. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Hôtel Havane is in the heart of Paris, walking distance from Folies Bergere and Paris Museum of Freemasonry. This hotel is close to Louvre Museum and Notre Dame Cathedral.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Folies Bergere - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Paris Museum of Freemasonry - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Passage Verdeau - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi

Paris Bourse - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Porte Saint-Denis - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Galeries Lafayette - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Theatre Mogador - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Museum of Romantic Life - 1 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 16 km / 10 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 21.8 km / 13.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hôtel Havane is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Hotel Havane are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 16 km / 10 mi
Paris (CDG-Charles de Gaulle) - 20.1 km / 12.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Havane is Paris (CDG-Charles de Gaulle).
